name: download
notes: download is a filesystem-based HTTP file downloader for downloading and extracting files to disk. The API takes a URL and optional destination directory path (e.g., download('http://example.com/foo.jpg', 'dist')), downloads the file via HTTP/HTTPS, and writes it to the filesystem using fs.writeFileSync or createWriteStream. Supports extracting archives with the extract option using decompress to extract zip/tar files to disk. Requires persistent filesystem write access for saving downloaded files and stream piping to disk. Workers is a stateless serverless environment without persistent filesystem write access. For file downloads in Workers, fetch() data directly and return Response to client, or upload to R2 storage using env.R2_BUCKET.put(). Similar filesystem-based download utilities include node-fetch with fs.createWriteStream, axios with fs streams, got with pipe to filesystem.
